pages.text: Create an explosion at the given location with the given power.

A power of 3 is about as much as a Creeper's blast; 4 is about as much as a TNT blast. The power is capped at 10.$(br2)Costs about one $(item)Amethyst Shard/$ per point of explosion power, plus one $(item)Amethyst Shard/$.
Create a fiery explosion at the given location with the given power.
Costs about one $(item)Amethyst Shard/$ per point of explosion power, plus three $(item)Amethyst Shard/$s. Otherwise, the same as $(l:hex:patterns/spells/basic#OpExplode)$(action)Explosion/$.
Propel the given entity in the given direction. The strength of the impulse is determined by the length of the vector.$(br)Costs about 1 $(item)Amethyst Dust/$ per length of the vector squared.
Teleport the given entity along its look vector by the given length.$(br)Costs about 2 $(item)Amethyst Dust/$s per distance teleported, squared.
